item.descripcion: Used to gather Estus at bonfires for HP recovery in the field
Increases Humanity by 1 and fully restores HP when consumed.
Increases Humanity by 2 and fully restores HP when consumed.
Used to upgrade Estus Flask to heal more HP per flaskCan also be used as an item to gain 5 Humanity (NOT recommended).
Healing Item which restores all health and removes all negative status ailments except for Curse.
Used to determine height and lethality of a fall.
Used to repair broken equipment without the need of a repair box or smith.
Lets you damage ghosts for a limited time
Transports player to the last visited Bonfire without loss of souls or humanity.
Temporary boost to stamina recovery speed
Reduces the accumulation of bleed
Reduces the accumulation of poison and cancels poisoned status
Reduces the accumulation of poison and toxic and cancels Toxic status
Reduces curse build-up and breaks curse
Applies Fire to your right-hand weapon
Applies Poison build-up to your right-hand weapon
Applies Lightning to your right-hand weapon
Removes parasitic egg from body
Regenerates HP for 30 seconds
Modify +5 Normal weapons into +10 Normal. Modify +5 Normal weapons into +5 Raw. Blacksmith: Andre
Modify +10 Normal weapons into +15 Normal. Blacksmith: Andre
Modify +5 Normal weapons into +5 Divine. Blacksmith: Andre
Modify +5 Divine weapons into +10 Divine. Blacksmith: Andre
Modify +5 Divine weapons into +5 Occult. Blacksmith: Andre
Modify +5 Magic weapons into +10 Magic. Blacksmith: Rickert
Modify +5 Magic weapons into +5 Enchanted. Blacksmith: Rickert
Modify +10 Normal weapons into +5 Crystal. Blacksmith: Giant Blacksmith
Modify +5 Fire weapons into +10 Fire. Blacksmith: Blacksmith Vamos
Modify +5 Fire weapons into +5 Chaos. Blacksmith: Blacksmith Vamos
Used to repair damaged equipment.Only needs to be bought once, but you still need to use souls as you would if a Blacksmith did the repair for you.

Tool used to etch Titanite into weapons for reinforcement.Only needs to be bought once, but you still need to use souls as you would if a Blacksmith did the reinforcement for you.Some upgrades, especially the first branch of a new upgrade path, require a Blacksmith.Example: You must have Blacksmith turn a +5 weapon into a divine weapon,but you can then use the smithbox to upgrade to Divine level +1..+5
Tool used to etch titanite into armor for reinforcement.Only needs to be bought once, but you still need to use souls as you would if a Blacksmith did the reinforcement for you.
Store excess items without limit.
Kindle bonfires past their limit.
Warp between Bonfires. This only applies to certain bonfires.Unlock final area, the Kiln of the First Flame.
Kindle Lordvessel at Firelink Altar.
Kindle Lordvessel at Firelink Altar.
Kindle Lordvessel at Firelink Altar
Kindle Lordvessel at Firelink Altar

Found Location: Gotten by choosing it as a gift, or the thief class, at the start of the game. Buy it for 5,000 souls from Domhnall of Zena after he moves under the bridge by Firelink Shrine. Unlocks Location: Unlocks many locks in the early areas. See which locks it opens in the MK section to the right, or on the Master Key page. In Master Key?: MK
Found Location: Northern Undead Asylum. On corpse dropped into cell. Unlocks Location: Northern Undead Asylum. Cell door. In Master Key?: No
Found Location: Undead Asylum. Gift from Oscar of Astora. Unlocks Location: Undead Asylum. Door behind boulder trap. In Master Key?: No

Found Location: Firelink Shrine. Roof of building flooded with water. Accessible after unlocking lift to Undead Church. Unlocks Location: Undead Asylum. Open the door guarded by Elite Undead, leads to Rusted Iron Ring. In Master Key?: No
Found Location: Dropped by Asylum Demon. Also given by Oscar of Astora if the Asylum Demon is slain before acquiring the Estus Flask. Unlocks Location: Undead Asylum. Exit Asylum. In Master Key?: No
Found Location: Undead Burg. Bought from Undead Merchant. Unlocks Location: Access 3x Gold Pine Resin in a residence in Undead Burg.Frees Griggs of Vinheim in Lower Undead Burg. In Master Key?: Yes

Found Location: Undead Parish. On the rafters behind a ladder in the room under the Fang Boar. Unlocks Location: Frees Lautrec. Behind a breakable door, on the second floor of the Undead Church. In Master Key?: Yes

Found Location: Found on the steps to Undead Church, right behind the big gate. Unlocks Location: Unlocks the small door at the start of the Hellkite bridge, leading to Lower Undead Burg In Master Key?: No

Found Location: Lower Undead Burg. Dropped by Capra Demon. Unlocks Location: Unlocks the door to the Depths. Go right just before the Capra Demon's fog wall, the door is at the bottom of the tower by two thieves. In Master Key?: No

Found Location: Depths. On a corpse in the room with the giant rat. The key is also accessible from the other side of the iron bars. Unlocks Location: Unlocks Bonfire room in the first slime-hallway in Depths. In Master Key?: Yes
Found Location: Depths. Dropped by Gaping Dragon. Unlocks Location: Unlocks Blighttown. Huge doors beside Domhnall of Zena (sewer merchant) in Depths. In Master Key?: No

Found Location: Darkroot Garden. On top of the tower, after crossing the Moonlight Butterfly bridge. Unlocks Location: Unlock shortcut between Undead Burg and Darkroot Basin, guarded by Havel. In Master Key?: Yes

Found Location: Blighttown. In the Chest at the end of the cave, when entering from the Valley of Drakes. Unlocks Location: Unlocks shortcut between New Londo Ruins and Valley of Drakes. In Master Key?: Yes

Found Location: New Londo Ruins. Gift from Ingward after getting the Lordvessel. He will also drop it if killed. Unlocks Location: Access lower New Londo, Valley of Drakes (2nd entrance) and The Abyss. In Master Key?: No

Found Location: Sen's Fortress. At the bottom of the tower with Crestfallen Merchant. Jump across the broken bridge to access the tower. Unlocks Location: Unlocks hidden cages in Sen's Fortress. Frees Logan and a Soul of a Hero.Unlocks cage elevator in Sen's Fortress. In Master Key?: Yes

Found Location: The Duke's Archives. Dropped by the sleeping Man-Serpent just outside the bonfire. Unlocks Location: Opens prison in Archive Tower. Opens the third door down from the bonfire. In Master Key?: No

Found Location: The Duke's Archives. Found on corpse after dropping down from cell 3 to 4. Unlocks Location: Opens the other cell doors in Archive Tower. Also opens the second door in the Bonfire cell, and a shortcut to the gramophone. In Master Key?: No
Found Location: The Duke's Archives. Found in the chest behind the gramophone. Unlocks Location: Exit Archive Tower. In Master Key?: No

Found Location: The Duke's Archives. Found in the chest at the bottom of the Archives, by the exit to the Crystal Cave. Unlocks Location: Opens the cell behind the Pisacas. Free Big Hat Logan. In Master Key?: No

Found Location: Painted World of Ariamis.Found in the underground sewers section, located in a dead end behind an illusory wall. Unlocks Location: Opens Annex in Painted World. Get Dark Ember. In Master Key?: No
Found Location: Bought from Blacksmith Andre for 20,000 souls. Dropped by Blacksmith Andre Unlocks Location: Opens the sealed gate within Darkroot Garden. In Master Key?: No
Found Location: Undead Asylum, found near the Dungeon Cell Key after Firelink Shrine has been visited. Unlocks Location: Access Painted World of Ariamis. In Master Key?: No

Found Location: The Duke's Archives. Dropped by the Crystal Golem after the first elevator. Dusk of Oolacile must have been rescued for the pendant to drop. (AotA only) Unlocks Location: Access Lost Oolacile from the Darkroot Basin. In Master Key?: No
Found Location: Oolacile Township. Found inside a Mimic near a lit fireplace. (AotA only) Unlocks Location: Access Hawkeye Gough. In Master Key?: No
Online play item used to write and rate messages left by other players.
Online play item used to leave a summon sign for cooperative play.
The crystal sends phantoms back to their world or sends you back to yours.
Online play item used to leave summon sign for competitive play.
This consumable item will allow you to invade another player's world.
This reusable item allows the player to invade another player's world.
Invade the world of a sinner.
Resets invasion timer.
Online play item. Checklist of indicted players.
Online play item. Indict invader.
Check servants of the Daughters of Chaos.
Invade the world of a possessor of a Dragon Scale.
Lure Phantoms from other worlds.
Used to rank up in the Warriors of Sunlight covenant
Used to rank up in the Blades of the Darkmoon covenant
Online play item used to exit Battle of Stoicism. (AotA Only)
Reinforce standard weapons to +5 Reinforce standard armor to +3
Reinforce standard weapons to +10, Raw weapons to +5 Reinforce standard armor to +6
Reinforce standard weapons to +14, Crystal and Lightning weapons to +4, Reinforce standard armor to +9
Reinforce standard weapons to +15, Crystal and Lightning weapons to +5, Reinforce standard armor to +10
Reinforce Magic, Divine, and Fire weapons to +5
Reinforce Magic weapons to +9, Enchanted weapons to +4
Reinforce Magic weapons to +10, Enchanted weapons to +5
Reinforce Fire weapons to +9, Chaos weapons to +4
Reinforce Fire weapons to +10, Chaos weapons to +5
Reinforce Divine weapons to +9, Occult weapons to +4
Reinforce Divine weapons to +10, Occult weapons to +5
Reinforce non-infusable weapons and rare armor to +5
Reinforce weapons made with Boss Souls to +5
Reinforce Dragon weapons to +5
Throwable item. Deals AOE fire damage.
Throwable item. Deals heavy AOE fire damage.
Throwable item. Inflicts toxic status on enemies and the user.
Projectile that deals light damage.
Projectile that deals poison damage.
Throwable item. Attracts some enemies.
Throwable item. Prevents the use of Estus within the area of effect.
Gives 200 souls when consumed. Can be sold to Frampt for 500 souls.

item.nombre: Large Soul of a Lost Undead
item.descripcion: Gives 400 souls when consumed. Can be sold to Frampt for 500 souls.
Gives 800 souls when consumed.

item.nombre: Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier
item.descripcion: Gives 1,000 souls when consumed.
Gives 2,000 souls when consumed.

item.nombre: Large Soul of a Proud Knight
item.descripcion: Gives 3,000 souls when consumed.
Gives 5,000 souls when consumed.

item.nombre: Large Soul of a Brave Warrior
item.descripcion: Gives 8,000 souls when consumed.
Gives 10,000 souls when consumed.
Gives 20,000 souls when consumed.
Moonlight Butterfly Horn (Ascended from +10 spear weapons) Crystal Ring Shield (Ascended from +10 shields) 1,200 souls if consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 8,000 souls.
Quelaag's Furysword (Ascended from +10 curved sword) Chaos Blade (Ascended from +10 katana sword) Gives 8,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 10,000 souls.
Dragon Bone Fist (Ascended from +10 fist weapons) Golem Axe (Ascended from +10 axe weapons) Gives 12,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 8,000 souls (less value).
Darkmoon Bow (Ascended from +10 bow weapons) Tin Darkmoon Catalyst (Ascended from cane catalyst) Gives 16,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 20,000 souls.
Dragonslayer Spear (Ascended from +10 spear weapons) Gives 12,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 8,000 souls (less value).
Smough's Hammer (Ascended from +10 strike weapons) Gives 12,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 1 (one) soul (less value).

Greatsword of Artorias (Ascended from +10 Broken Straight Sword or Straight Sword Hilt) Greatsword of Artorias (Cursed) (Ascended from +10 great sword weapons) Greatshield of Artorias (Ascended from +10 shields) Gives 16,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 4,000 souls (less value).
Lifehunt Scythe (Ascended from +10 scythe or whip weapons) Gives 12,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 15,000 souls.

item.nombre: Soul of Gwyn, Lord of Cinder
item.descripcion: Great Lord Greatsword (Ascended from +10 greatsword weapons) Sunlight Spear (10 Sunlight Medals at Sunlight Altar) Gives 20,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 40,000 souls.
(AotA Only) Gives 12,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 10,000 souls (less value).

(AotA Only) Abyss Greatsword (Ascended from +10 greatsword weapons) Dark Silver Tracer and Gold Tracer (give soul to Ciaran, or kill her) Gives 16,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 10,000 souls (less value).
(AotA Only) Manus Catalyst (Ascended from catalysts) Pursuers (trade to Snuggly) Gives 18,000 souls when consumed. Can also be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 10,000 souls (less value).
Holding it in the left hand (shield-hand) and holding L1 or LB causes it to light an area around the character like a torch.
Using it as an item causes you to use the binoculars to see further.Can be used to aim Crossbows for long-distance shooting.
Sends the user back to the last used bonfire upon death.Can be used as an item (unlimited uses) to warp back to previous bonfire at any point, losing all souls and humanity
Turns your head into one of a dragon.
Turns you completely into a Dragonoid.
Invade the world of the murderer of a firekeeper

Creates a field around the player that deflects Dark Magic for a few seconds. It is activated in a way similar to Force, though the player is able to move briefly whilst the pendant is still in effect.

Appears to have no use. Can be chosen as a gift upon character creation. Dropped by Reah of Thorolund if Petrus kills her. Rare drop from invaders in Darkroot Garden. Can be traded with Snuggly for a Souvenir of Reprisal.

It has no value. Found by dropping down, to the area below, right in front of the first fog door in Undead Burg.Possible reward from defeating a trespasser while in the Forest Hunters. Can be traded with Snuggly for a Titanite Chunk.

Coin made of copper. Its face shows an image of Old Man McLoyf, god of medicine and drink. Talk to Petrus of Thorolund a couple times before Reah arrives and he will give you one. Can be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 1.000 souls.
Coin made of silver, with the portrait of the legendary Knight King Rendal on its face. A Mimic in Anor Londo drops 5 of these. Can be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 3.000 souls.
Coin made of gold, with Allfather Lloyd and his white halo shown on its face. Dropped by a Mimic in Anor Londo. Found on a body in the Painted World. Can be sold to Kingseeker Frampt for 5.000 souls.

hechizo.efecto: Fires a magical projectile. Excellent starting spell which does very good damage against most enemies in the early game areas.
Stronger soul arrow, same cast time as soul arrow, fewer uses.
Stronger than greater soul arrow, longer casting time.
Stronger than heavy soul arrow, fewer uses. Has a slow cast time, but deals a tremendous amount of damage, even against bosses.

Fires multiple, homing magic projectiles. Can be successfully cast without an initial "lock on". Multiple soul arrows will hover above the player. Each individual soul arrow will seek the closest target, in the direction the player is facing, when in range. Because the spell can be cast in advance, it has a unique advantage in that, if timed correctly, it can be cast in synchronicity with other attacks.

Fires multiple, homing crystal projectiles. Can be successfully cast without an initial "lock on". Multiple crystal arrows will hover above the player. Each individual soul arrow will seek the closest target, in the direction the player is facing, when in range.
Fire piercing soul spear.
Fire an even more powerful, piercing ranged attack.

A straight line of crystals pop out of the ground in front of you, shooting towards your target. One advantage of this spell is that it will take out large groups of enemies if they are lined up one behind the other. It has a medium cast time, but once it fires, it will take out anything in its path. 20 casts make this a great high level replacement for the soul arrow at high levels, as it's not as useful on most bosses.

Enhances the right-hand weapon. Weapon must be standard, crystal, or raw. Some Dragon and Unique weapons can be enchanted too. Adds 0.8x your Magic Adjustment stat (NOT Intelligence) magic damage to your weapon.

Enhances the right-hand weapon. Weapon must be standard, crystal, or raw. Some Dragon and Unique weapons can be enchanted too. Adds 1.1x your Magic Adjustment stat (NOT Intelligence) magic damage to your weapon.

Enhances and crystallizes right-hand weapon. Weapon must be standard, crystal, or raw. Some Dragon and Unique weapons can be enchanted too. Adds 1.4x your Magic Adjustment stat (NOT Intelligence) as magic damage to your weapon.

Reinforces the equipped shield or weapon able to block in the left hand with magic. Works on all types of shields (even unique or upgraded to any path) and on all weapons able to block while on the left hand (even unique or upgraded to any path). Halves stamina used on hit deflection (only on shields) and improves the weapon's or shield's magic resistance by 30% (by up to a maximum of 90%). Lasts 15 seconds, 5 casts.

Reinforces the equipped shield or weapon able to block in the left hand with a stronger magic effect. Works on all types of shields (even unique or upgraded to any path) and on all weapons able to block while on the left hand (even unique or upgraded to any path). Reduces the stamina used to deflect a hit considerably (only on shields) and improves all the resistances of the shield or weapon enchanted to 100%. Lasts 15 seconds, 3 casts.
Lures enemies away by creating a sound originating in the distance.
Masks all noises of caster.
Reduces damage and noise from fall. However, terminal falls will still kill you even with this active.
Turns your right hand weapon invisible. Weapon must be standard, crystal, or raw. Some Dragon and Unique weapons can be enchanted too.
Masks your presence, making detection harder.
Repairs weapons and armor
Cast a bright light upon surroundings, and lasts 5 minutes. Particularly useful for Tomb of Giants

Transform the caster into an inanimate object. Generally, the object you become is something common to the area you are in. Could be a vase, or a box, etc. Some strategy must be used, and the most effective is to place yourself in a cluster of similar objects. Once cast, you can move slowly and position yourself. If done properly, an enemy will walk by you and never know you're there. Cannot run when using, any other action breaks the effect.
Removes poison/toxic/bleeding build up, and cures poison/toxic status.
Removes curse build up.
After a brief charge, fires a large shot at your target.
Fires a large amount of small dark orbs that fan outwards—very fast cast time. Excellent against large bosses.
Creates a fog that inflicts poison. The fog is created at the location of the locked target.
Slow moving dark soul mass, fires and homes in on target when in range. Slower moving than homing soul mass but has much better homing capabilities.
Standard pyromancy of the Great Swamp. Hurl fireball.
Pyromancy which improves upon Fireball. Hurl fire orb.
Ultimate fireball pyromancy. Hurl giant fireball.
Hurl giant chaos fireball, leaving a large amount of temporary lava
Primal pyromancy taught by Quelana of Izalith. Erect fire pillars in vicinity. Note: Uses 17 uses per cast.
Primal pyromancy of Quelana of Izalith. Erect giant fire pillars in vicinity.
Erect localized chaos fire pillars which leave blobs of temporary lava Note: Like firestorm and leaves a little lava behind.
Elementary pyromancy. Create powerful flame in hand Note: Good 'melee' range spell, very quick too.
Pyromancy which improves upon Combustion. Create powerful, giant flame in hand. Note: Very good melee range spell.
Pyromancy foreign to the Great Swamp. Create a surge of flame from palm of hand. Note: Rapid fire spell you can cast while moving.
Primal pyromancy taught by Quelana of Izalith. Sweep foes with fire whip. Note: Uses 21 uses per cast. Note:Hits twice/cast
Sweep foes with chaos fire whip with lava traces Note: Leaves lava behind for a bit. Follows same mechanics as Fire Whip.
Breathes out a cone of poison mist that fills the surrounding area causing poison status.
Breathes out a cone of toxic mist that fills the surrounding area causing toxic status.
Pyromancy foreign to the Great Swamp. Emit acid which corrodes weapons and armor damaging their durability. Does not affect user.
Covers the player in water, reduces fire damage.
Self-buff, raises defenses and poise. Note: User becomes heavy and unable to move freely: can only walk, can't run, sprint, roll, or jump.
Increases Attack and Defense but gradually drains HP
Advanced pyromancy of Quelana of Izalith. Charm undead and gain temporary allies. Melee ranged support spell with about 2 second cast time.

Similar to Great Combustion. Melee-range pyromancy. Main difference with Great Combustion is that when Black Flame is blocked, it consumes a much higher amount of stamina than Great Combustion, making this pyromancy great for breaking guards.
Heals a moderate amount of the casters HP, depending on faith.
Cut down version of Great Heal. Heals large amount of HP to the caster. (NOTE: This spell does not affect allies as the erroneous load screen info would have you believe.)
Heals a large amount of the casters HP, depending on faith.
Heals large amount of HP to the caster and nearby allies. Scales with faith. Must be part of the Princess's Guard to use.
Gradually restores HP over time for a short duration.
Gradually restores HP over time for a short duration to you and nearby allies. Must be part of the Princess's Guard to use.
AoE effect that does no damage but knocks back most surrounding enemies Must be very close to cause knockdown Can deflect sorceries such as Homing Soulmass.
A fast casting force spell that deals high damage in a bubble around you. One of the most powerful offensive miracles in the game. Can deflect sorceries.
Shoots a large ball of force energy to explode on the target causing damage to the target and close surrounding enemies. Can deflect sorceries.
Reduces incoming magic damage for a short duration. (70%)?
As Magic Barrier but reduces even more magic damage. (90%)?
Transports you back to the last used bonfire.

The Seek Guidance miracle allows the player to see more messages on the ground as well as their positive and negative ratings. Additional developer messages, providing hints, can also be seen in some areas.

Karmic Justice is a self-buff that lasts for 1 minute. If the player takes successive hits in PHYSICAL damage (meaning melee and non-magical), the spell explodes, dealing massive damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them all down. A very effective miracle for players who wear cloth armor with no poise. If they get stunlocked by a combo, this spell can save you from certain death.
An AoE silence around you that stops all casting in the area, including your own, for about 25 seconds. Does not scale with faith.
Applies a debuff to nearby enemies which slows movement speed, that lasts for about 10 seconds.
A powerful spear of light that inflicts lightning damage. Scales with faith. Can be thrown into bodies of water to cause AoE. (Puddles, lakes,etc.)
A larger, more powerful spear of light that inflicts lightning damage. Scales with faith. Can be thrown into water to cause AoE. (Puddles, lakes,etc.)

A very powerful version of the lightning spear. Fewer charges but a lot more damage. Scales with faith. Can be thrown into water to cause AoE. (Puddles, lakes,etc.) Must remain part of Warriors of Sunlight to use.
Coats right hand weapon in lightning. Adds 1.8x your talisman's Magic Adjustment value as Lightning Damage.

Boosts right hand weapon with rays of Darkmoon. Adds 1.8x your talisman's Magic Adjustment value as Magic Damage at Covenant Rank 0. Scaling increases by 0.1x for each rank to a maximum of 2.1x at Covenant Rank 3. • Must be member of Darkmoon covenant to use.

AoE miracle similar to Gravelord Nito's "scream sword" attack. Several swords will pierce the ground impaling enemies in the area. Miracle is very effective when used in close quarters such as hallways or bridges as several swords may impale the same enemy.
Upgraded version of Gravelord Sword Dance miracle. Area of effect is expanded and increased damage.

Escape Death is a self-buff that prevents the user from losing souls and humanity after death. The miracle will not work if the user has two other self-buffs active (i.e. having both the Green Blossom stamina regen effect and the Transient Curse's effect will prevent the use of this miracle). Upon death, the message "Magic Revived" appears in green lettering identical to the "Ring Revival" message produced when a player dies with a Ring of Sacrifice equipped.
